name: Neon Chrome Deluxe
description:
Neon Chrome - Arena is an arena type survival game mode with leaderboards. Your goal is to survive as long as possible using any means necessary. Play single or as local co-op! How high can you score before your demise? 

- Score attack survival arena mode for 1-4 players (local co-op)
- Leaderboards to rank your performance against friends and the world
- Choose from five roles - each role has its own leaderboard and playstyle
- Install up to 12 enhancements during your run
- Upgrade your damage output with weapon upgrades and crates
- Unlock weapons and enhancements in the main game - use them on the Arena
